author: NetworkChuck
description:
Are you really still using VPN? You need Twingate: https://ntck.co/twingate_telos 


If you’ve got AI anxiety about your career, you need to watch this. In this video, I dive into the “Telos File”, a single markdown document that keeps everything about you. Then, we run it through a personal pentest; challenging your goals, values, identity, blindspots, and vulnerabilities. In this video I’ll show you how to use it, and by the end, you’ll know yourself better than you did before. I also sat down with Daniel Miessler, the creator of Telos, to break down the philosophy and power of this idea. One document. Seven minutes. It might just change your life.


RESOURCES:

📝 Telos on GitHub: https://github.com/danielmiessler/Telos

✍️ Telos Template (by Daniel Miessler): https://github.com/theNetworkChuck/telos/blob/main/problems.md
🤖 Telos Prompt (for AI): https://github.com/theNetworkChuck/telos/blob/main/telos_prompt.md
❗ Problems List (to help build your file): https://github.com/theNetwor
title: I Pentested My Life — Here’s What Broke
